data.title: Cities and Memory contributing artists
data.meta_description: About the thousands of artists all over the world who are contributors to the sound art and field recording project Cities and Memory.
data.meta_site_name: Cities & Memory | Field Recordings, Sound Map, Sound Art
data.text:
This is a directory of everyone who’s contributed recordings and/or reimagined sounds to Cities and Memory – more than 1,800 artists, musicians and recordists have taken part in the project from all over the world.

A massive and heartfelt THANK YOU to all of the contributors below – if you’ve enjoyed a particular piece by an artist, please do look them up and check out their other music, recordings, art and writings.
